id.description: The unique ID of the subscription.

currency_code.description: The currency code used for the subscription.

start_date.description: The start date of the subscription.

trial_end.description: The end date of the trial period for the subscription.

remaining_billing_cycles.description: The count of remaining billing cycles for the subscription.

po_number.description: The purchase order number associated with the subscription.

plan_quantity_in_decimal.description: The quantity of the plan in decimal format.

plan_unit_price_in_decimal.description: The unit price of the plan in decimal format.

customer_id.description: The ID of the customer associated with the subscription.

status.description: The current status of the subscription.

trial_start.description: The start date of the trial period for the subscription.

trial_end_action.description: The action to be taken at the end of the trial period.

current_term_start.description: The start date of the current term for the subscription.

current_term_end.description: The end date of the current term for the subscription.

next_billing_at.description: The date and time of the next billing event for the subscription.

created_at.description: The date and time of the creation of the subscription.

started_at.description: The date and time when the subscription started.

activated_at.description: The date and time when the subscription was activated.

contract_term_billing_cycle_on_renewal.description: Indicates if the contract term billing cycle is applied on renewal.

override_relationship.description: Indicates if the existing relationship is overridden by this subscription.

pause_date.description: The date on which the subscription was paused.

resume_date.description: The date on which the subscription was resumed.

cancelled_at.description: The date and time when the subscription was cancelled.

cancel_reason.description: The reason for the cancellation of the subscription.

created_from_ip.description: The IP address from which the subscription was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the subscription was last updated.

has_scheduled_advance_invoices.description: Indicates if there are scheduled advance invoices for the subscription.

has_scheduled_changes.description: Indicates if there are scheduled changes for the subscription.

payment_source_id.description: The ID of the payment source used for the subscription.

plan_free_quantity_in_decimal.description: The free quantity included in the plan in decimal format.

plan_amount_in_decimal.description: The total amount charged for the plan in decimal format.

cancel_schedule_created_at.description: The date and time when the cancellation schedule was created.

due_invoices_count.description: The count of due invoices for the subscription.

due_since.description: The date since which the invoices are due.

total_dues.description: The total amount of dues for the subscription.

mrr.description: The monthly recurring revenue generated by the subscription.

exchange_rate.description: The exchange rate used for currency conversion.

base_currency_code.description: The base currency code used for the subscription.

invoice_notes.description: Any notes added to the invoices of the subscription.

deleted.description: Indicates if the subscription has been deleted.

coupon.description: The coupon applied to the subscription.

cancel_reason_code.description: The code associated with the cancellation reason.

free_period.description: The duration of the free period for the subscription.

free_period_unit.description: The unit of the free period duration.

create_pending_invoices.description: Indicates if pending invoices are created.

auto_close_invoices.description: Defines if the invoices are automatically closed or not.

business_entity_id.description: The ID of the business entity to which the subscription belongs.

channel.description: The channel through which the subscription was acquired.

coupon_id.description: The ID of the applied coupon.

apply_till.description: The date until which the coupon can be applied.

apply_count.description: The count of times the coupon can be applied.

coupon_code.description: The code of the applied coupon.

applied_count.description: The count of times the coupon has been applied.

shipping_address.description: Stores the shipping address related to the subscription

first_name.description: The first name in the shipping address.

last_name.description: The last name in the shipping address.

email.description: The email address in the shipping address.

company.description: The company name in the shipping address.

phone.description: The phone number in the shipping address.

line1.description: The first line of the shipping address.

line2.description: The second line of the shipping address.

line3.description: The third line of the shipping address.

city.description: The city in the shipping address.

state_code.description: The state code in the shipping address.

state.description: The state in the shipping address.

country.description: The country in the shipping address.

zip.description: The ZIP or postal code in the shipping address.

validation_status.description: The validation status of the shipping address.

referral_info.description: Contains details related to any referral information associated with the subscription

referral_code.description: The code associated with the referral.

coupon_code.description: The coupon code used for the referral.

referral_id.description: The unique identifier of the referral.

external_reference_id.description: The external reference identifier of the referral.

reward_status.description: The status of the reward for the referral.

account_id.description: The account identifier of the referral.

campaign_id.description: The campaign identifier of the referral.

external_campaign_id.description: The external campaign identifier of the referral.

friend_offer_type.description: The type of offer for a friend in the referral program.

referrer_reward_type.description: The type of reward for the referrer in the referral program.

notify_referral_system.description: Whether to notify the referral system.

destination_url.description: The URL to which the referral leads.

post_purchase_widget_enabled.description: Whether the post-purchase widget is enabled for the referral.

contract_term.description: Contains details about the contract term of the subscription

id.description: The unique identifier of the contract term.

status.description: The status of the contract term.

contract_start.description: The start date of the contract.

contract_end.description: The end date of the contract.

billing_cycle.description: The billing cycle duration of the contract.

action_at_term_end.description: The action to be taken at the end of the contract term.

total_contract_value.description: The total value of the contract.

cancellation_cutoff_period.description: The period within which cancellation is allowed before the next term.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the contract term was created.

subscription_id.description: The identifier of the subscription associated with the contract term.

remaining_billing_cycles.description: The remaining billing cycles for the contract term.

subscription_items.description: Lists individual items included in the subscription

item_price_id.description: The unique identifier of the item price associated with the subscription item.

item_type.description: The type of the subscription item.

quantity.description: The quantity of the subscription item.

quantity_in_decimal.description: The quantity in decimal format for the subscription item.

unit_price.description: The unit price of the subscription item.

unit_price_in_decimal.description: The unit price in decimal format for the subscription item.

amount.description: The amount charged for the subscription item.

amount_in_decimal.description: The amount in decimal format for the subscription item.

free_quantity.description: The free quantity included with the subscription item.

free_quantity_in_decimal.description: The free quantity in decimal format for the subscription item.

trial_end.description: The end date of the trial period for the subscription item.

billing_cycles.description: The number of billing cycles for the subscription item.

service_period_days.description: The number of days in the service period.

charge_on_event.description: The event triggering the charge for the subscription item.

charge_once.description: Whether the subscription item is charged only once.

charge_on_option.description: The charge option for the subscription item.

object.description: The type of the subscription item.

item_tiers.description: Provides information about tiers or levels for specific subscription items

item_price_id.description: The identifier of the item price associated with the tier.

starting_unit.description: The starting unit of the tier.

ending_unit.description: The ending unit of the tier.

starting_unit_in_decimal.description: The starting unit in decimal format for the tier.

ending_unit_in_decimal.description: The ending unit in decimal format for the tier.

price_in_decimal.description: The price in decimal format for the tier.

object.description: The type of the item tier.

charged_items.description: Lists the items that have been charged as part of the subscription

item_price_id.description: The identifier of the item price charged.

last_charged_at.description: The timestamp of the last charge for the item.

object.description: The type of the charged item.

plan_id.description: The ID of the plan associated with the subscription.

plan_quantity.description: The quantity of the plan included in the subscription.

plan_unit_price.description: The unit price of the plan for the subscription.

setup_fee.description: The setup fee charged for the subscription.

billing_period.description: The billing period duration for the subscription.

billing_period_unit.description: The unit of the billing period.

auto_collection.description: Indicates if auto-collection is enabled for the subscription.

plan_amount.description: The total amount charged for the plan of the subscription.

plan_free_quantity.description: The free quantity included in the plan of the subscription.

gift_id.description: The ID of the gift associated with the subscription.

affiliate_token.description: The affiliate token associated with the subscription.

offline_payment_method.description: The offline payment method used for the subscription.

addons.description: Represents any additional features or services added to the subscription

id.description: The unique identifier of the addon.

unit_price.description: The unit price of the addon.

amount.description: The amount charged for the addon.

trial_end.description: The end date of the trial period for the addon.

remaining_billing_cycles.description: The remaining billing cycles for the addon.

quantity_in_decimal.description: The quantity in decimal format for the addon.

unit_price_in_decimal.description: The unit price in decimal format for the addon.

amount_in_decimal.description: The amount in decimal format for the addon.

event_based_addons.description: Specifies any event-based addons associated with the subscription

id.description: The unique identifier of the event-based addon.

unit_price.description: The unit price of the addon.

on_event.description: The event triggering the addon charge.

charge_once.description: Whether the addon is charged only once.

quantity_in_decimal.description: The quantity in decimal format for the addon.

unit_price_in_decimal.description: The unit price in decimal format for the addon.

charged_event_based_addons.description: Details of addons charged based on events

id.description: The ID of the charged event-based addon.

last_charged_at.description: The date and time of the last charge for the addon.

discounts.description: Includes any discounts applied to the subscription

id.description: The unique identifier of the discount.

invoice_name.description: The name of the discount on the invoice.

percentage.description: The percentage value of the discount.

currency_code.description: The currency code of the discount.

duration_type.description: The duration type of the discount (e.g., forever, once).

period.description: The period for which the discount is applicable.

period_unit.description: The unit of the period (e.g., days, months).

included_in_mrr.description: Whether the discount is included in Monthly Recurring Revenue (MRR) calculation.

apply_on.description: The item to which the discount is applied.

item_price_id.description: The identifier of the item price associated with the discount.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the discount was created.

apply_till.description: The expiry date until which the discount is applicable.

applied_count.description: The number of times the discount has been applied.

coupon_id.description: The identifier of the coupon used for the discount.

custom_fields.description: Any custom fields associated with the subscription.
